positions.description: Court Appointed Special Advocate. Ensures that abused and neglected children are given a voice in family court. The two main goals are to find a permanent placement for the child and to advocate for appropriate medical, educational, and therapeutic care while the child is under the jurisdiction of the court.
positions.title: Volunteer/Advocate
